data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The biology department at my school is very difficult. They ____ all ____ students ____ take ____ courses ____ the ____, ____ I ____ the ____ is ____. At least the students will probably be able to find good careers after graduation, although not all are able to complete the program.
data.partBlankContent: The biology department at my school is very difficult. They req____ all th___ students t_ take mult____ courses i_ the scie____, a__ I he__ the gra____ is str___. At least the students will probably be able to find good careers after graduation, although not all are able to complete the program.
data.answer: 我们学校的生物系很难。他们要求所有的学生选修多门理科课程，而且我听说评分很严格。虽然不是所有的学生都能完成课程，但至少这些学生在毕业后可能会找到好的职业。
